contest-event.event-date:
April 6, 2019 D North American Championships (First Section)
North American Championships (First Section) 10 Set Test and Own Choice North American Championships north-american-championships-1st-section
United States of America
First
...Another World's Hell
Embassy Theatre, Fort Wayne, Indiana, USA Programme of between 23 and 36 minutes, including Set Work. The overall score is weighted as 60% of Set Piece score plus 40% of Own Choice score
Penalty points for exceeding programme time limit as follows: 3 points - Central Ohio Brass Band 6 points - Illinois Brass Band, Five Lakes Silver Band 9 points - Rockville Brass Band, Madison Brass Band 12 points - Oakland University Brass Band 18 points - Arkansas Musicworks Brass Band (1 point penalty per adjuducator is assessed for each minute or fraction thereof by which the maximum stage time is exceeded)
1st tiebreaker - band with the highest Set Work score wins 2nd tiebreaker - band rated higher on the Set Work by 2 of the 3 adjudicators wins
April 7, 2019, 12:56 p.m. Dec. 5, 2019, 1:49 p.m.
1 Dublin Silver Band Tim Jameson Out of the Storm Clouds
2 Central Illinois Brass Band Stephen Squires Harmony Music
3 Central Ohio Brass Band Jessica Sneeringer The Saga of Haakon the Good
4 Rockville Brass Band Nigel Horne The Essence of Time
5 Oakland University Brass Band Kenneth Kroesche Journey to the Centre of the Earth
6 Five Lakes Silver Band Steven Kandow The Torchbearer
7 Arkansas Musicworks Brass Band William Ratcliff The Year of the Dragon
8 James Madison University Brass Band Craig Mason Abaddon “The Dark Angel”
Withdrawn Brass Band at Indiana University Unknown
